page.title: 06THE MARLBOROUGH MOP FAIR
page.content:
The Mop Fair is in an unusual place - it is in the middle of the High Street, which is closed except to fire engines, for the day. It is held on two Saturdays nearest to October 10th. It is called "The Mop" because it used to be a hiring fair about 150 years ago, and people could come and choose new servants, who carried the tools of their trade (e.g. a mop).
All the rides and attractions of the fair are put up all through Friday, ready for Saturday. The fair is very noisy and carries on well into Saturday night. By magic, everything is cleared away in a couple of hours early on Sunday morning and by breakfast the fair has gone.
